scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Widget-Title}
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Connected">Reporting is healthy. The ETL last ran at {enddate}.</resource> <resource name="Date_Unknown">Unknown</resource> <resource name="Disabled">Reporting is currently disabled. </resource> <resource name="EtlNotRecent">The reporting data is not recent. The ETL last completed at {enddate}. Ensure that the ETL is scheduled within Scheduled Tasks.</resource> <resource name="EtlNotRun">The ETL has not yet started. Ensure that the ETL is scheduled within Scheduled Tasks.</resource> <resource name="EtlRunning">The ETL is currently running. The process started at {startdate}.</resource> <resource name="InvalidConnection">The connection to the reporting database could not be established on the following servers: {affectednodes}. Review the value of <code>Reporting</code> in <code>connectionStrings.config</code> and the servers' ability to connect to the reporting database.</resource> <resource name="LongRunningEtl">The ETL has been running for an extended period of time without finishing. The ETL last started at {startdate}. If the community was recently upgraded or if reporting data was recently reset, this may be normal. Otherwise, this may indicate a performance problem within the reporting database that should be reviewed.</resource> <resource name="MismatchedConfiguration">Servers serving this community are not consistently configured. Please review every server's configuration to ensure that the value of <code>Reporting</code> in <code>connectionStrings.config</code> is the same.</resource> <resource name="Unknown">The status of reporting is not yet known.</resource> <resource name="Widget-Description">Reporting System Indicator</resource> <resource name="Widget-Title">Reporting</resource> </language>
